name: prismatic-laser
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user shoots powerful lasers using the power of
a prism. The user can’t move on the next turn.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user shoots powerful lasers using the power of
a prism. The user can’t move on the next turn.
